description:
Creative Sempai: Saki-chan`s aren`t that big.
Fund-Raising Sempai: Let those who cannot work leave the magic club!
Pool Sempai: Water escape in a school swimsuit!!
Overcoming Sempai: Sempai won`t get stage fright in front of "handsome" assistant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Creative Sempai / Fund-Raising Sempai / Pool Sempai / Overcoming Sempai
Tsukuru Senpai / Kanpa Senpai / Pool Senpai / Norikoeru Senpai
作る先輩 / カンパ先輩 / プール先輩 / 乗り越える先輩
